title: Battle-Worn Blade
content:
Battle-Worn Blade Common 0~9 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8)-1 Slashing Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A fine but well-used sword. It seemed to have once belonged to a holy order, but the indication of rank and patron deity at the hilt have recently been filed down. Longsword Versatile 1.35 75
